name: War is a Losing Game
description:
This game aims to highlight how Nuclear Warfare is a “losing game” – there are no winners. Set in the fictional city of Cheverovsk, Russia during the Cold War, the player is a Sergeant at a military airbase which becomes the victim of a Nuclear attack.

Not only do Nuclear Weapons create an unnecessarily large number of casualties, the time and resources used to create them could instead be utilised for something more progressive; such as nuclear power.
